description: the work under this standing offer comprises the furnishing of all labour, materials equipment and supervision required to perform the servicing inspection repairs and installation of hvacr equipment controlled by the delta direct digital controls system or the delta ddc components exclusively
full_summary:
### W6862-230140 - Standing Offer for Direct Digital Controls Maintenance Services

**Posting Date**: 2023-06-13

**Solicitation Number**: WS4053821836

**Notice Number**: None

#### Tender Information

A Standing Offer solicitation, W6862-230140, has been released for Direct Digital Controls Maintenance Services for the provision of HVAC/R equipment maintenance, inspection, repair, and installation services for the Department of National Defence.

**Tender Status**: Expired

**Type of Procurement**: Competitive - Open Bidding

**Procurement Category**: Services

**Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies

#### Contract Information

*   Contract Duration: [Expected Contract Start Date] 2023-08-01 to [Expected Contract End Date] 2026-07-31
*   Contractor shall provide all required labour, materials, equipment, and supervision to perform maintenance, inspection, repair, and installation of HVAC/R equipment controlled by the Delta Direct Digital Controls System or the Delta DDC components exclusively.

#### Geographic Regions
*   Work shall be performed in various locations across Canada with priority regions:
    *   Canadian Forces Base Comox, Lazo, British Columbia
*   Canadian and British Columbia tax rates will apply to all contract work. 
#### Contracting Entity

*   Contracting Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Contracting Entity Address:
    11 Laurier Street 
    Phase III 
    Place du Portage  
    Gatineau, Quebec  
    K1A 0S5  
    Canada

Please note that this notice has already expired, but other similar notices may be of interest. 

Some links to tenders similar to the one above:
*   HVAC technical specifications for government buildings [Link]
*   Building Energy Management Systems (BEMS) in federal buildings [Link] 
*   Tutoring services for building maintenance codes [Link]

### Notice Contact
For more information, contact Wong, Summer (SPAC/PSPC) via email at **summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca**. 

See more government tenders at the links at the bottom of this page.
